comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Henrietta Buckler Sieberling (1888-1979) was born in Kentucky, raised in El Paso TX. She attended Vassar and in 1917 married John Frederick Sieberling. They had three children together and lived in Ohio. She credited with being one of the founders of Alcoholics Anonymous. In 1998 she was inducted into the Ohio Women's Hall of Fame. www.aabibliography.com/henrietta_buckler_seiberling.htm

comment.author: 22791105@N06
comment._content: She has remarkable eyes.  I can only but guess what drove her.
